input: Construct a batch request involving contracts with UUIDs 33445566-7788-99aa-bbcc-ddeeff001122 and 44556677-8899-aabb-ccdd-eeff11223344, focusing on lifecycle status and administrative data.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/33445566-7788-99aa-bbcc-ddeeff001122?$select=PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusName,SystemAdministrativeData HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCardContracts/44556677-8899-aabb-ccdd-eeff11223344?$select=PaymentCardLifeCycleStatusName,SystemAdministrativeData HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
